name: President Evil
description:
(Formerly Sans and Obama goto Chuck E. Cheese)

Summary:

Obama and Sans are back at it again, for the first time.

Sans is Hungry one day and wants pizza. So Sans and Obama goto Chuck E. Cheese, only to find the interior shambles.

 As the door locks behind them, they're forced to find out the dark secret that Charles E Cheese is hiding from the world...

Contains

-An Armor system that shows change on your characters!

-A FULLY VOICE ACTED MAIN STORY

-1 Secret Boss

-An epic story with twists and turns.

-An array of horribly hand drawn enemies.

-Super Funny Jokes and Laughs and Goofs (Did I mention it's funny)

-Uncover Chuck E Cheese's dark secret.

-Save the world.
